means.word_mean: 1. a weekday on which no festival or holiday is celebrated;

sentences.sentence: "in the middle ages feria was used with a prefixed ordinal number to designate the day of the week, so `secunda feria' meant Monday, but Sunday and Saturday were always called by their names, Dominicus and Sabbatum, and so feria came to mean an ordinary we

means.word_mean: 2. (in Spanish speaking regions) a local festival or fair, usually in honor of some patron saint
